Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Teacher feedback can be pretty limited so changes I make may only gain me some marks but the feedback comes from somewhere that understands the assignment.  GenAI allows numerous amount of feedback which does throughout the process help my learning.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Both made me feel fine as they were just things I needed to work on. Teacher feedback can feel slightly overwhelming but GenAI feedback feels too underwhelming as if my assignment is “mostly very good” which is may not be.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
